sentences.sContent: Dropbears - Dropbears are an evil species of koala that fall from trees and attack humans.
sentences.sCn: 无尾熊--无尾熊是属于一种树袋熊类的邪恶物种，它专门跳下树攻击人类。

synos.tran: [脊椎]树袋熊，无尾熊（产于澳大利亚，又名考拉）

trans.tranOther: an Australian animal like a small grey bear with no tail that climbs trees and eats leaves
